Text: Could be worse. You got a problem?
Just figured I'd warn you about the whole shebang in that cavern back there...
See, I was treating myself to a looksie around the premises when I found myself taking a peak at the other end of that crevasse behind me.
However, as I waltzed on into it, some sludge creature crept up behind me! Only narrowly escaped by the skin of my teeth.
Alas, as more of a lover then a fighter, I'm stuck here twiddling my thumbs 'till the that cretin buggers off...
Well I'll have you know that I'm actually a fed, so I'm more then qualified to handle that for you.
What, with that flimsy piece of wood you're holding? Not a chance, mate!
You'd be a goner before you could even get a swing in!
But hey, I've been stumbling across abandoned equipment 'n shit here and there that may prove itself useful in your hands...
I reckon it'd be wise for you to have a look around. Perhaps you'll find something that'll gives you the upper hand on our lovely friend back there...
I'm more then just a pretty face, y'know...
Ah, got our hands on a cheeky lil' beartrap, have we?
Trap that monster with one of these and you might actually be able to put that flimsy bat of yours to use...
Granted, I wouldn't imagine it'd be hard for a beast like that to break through one of those, so try to be quick with it...
